content:
Now I am going to paste some notes the IT manager wrote. Dont worry if these dont make total sense to you. Just take them as is - I know you will not be able to read the links so just ignore those and ill provide more context on those files:

\*\*Notes & Required Documents\*\*

- CA & NV have different new hires packets currently in BOX, Both compiled PDFs and additional documents are found in this BOX folder:
 - [New Hire Documentation (open link)](https://clarksullivan.box.com/s/5p34hdruycidmqt7c1iuin466l8gvb9o)
- Different in required documents between office new hire and field new hire
 - These differences are shown on the checklist on Page 1-2 on the CA NEW HIRE PACKET
- \*\*Sheri Angel\*\* is the lead updater/compiler for the CA new hire document
 - She “babysits” superintendents who hire field employees to help them with the process
 - Currently using this file for the CA NEW HIRE PACKET:
 - [New Hire Packet CA 2022.pdf (open link)](https://clarksullivan.box.com/s/isagxtxnc2rpz6dpn13goyn6f7vzfdyo)
 - Sheri updates various files within the packet from different sources
 - CA DIR Website - [https://www.dir.ca.gov/dwc/forms.html](https://www.dir.ca.gov/dwc/forms.html)
 - Need List of DIR forms here
 
- \*\*Kevin Stroupe\*\* - Updates Insurance/Contribution Forms Yearly
 - Updates Medical Insurance Enrollment Forms
 - NV & CA have different insurance providers and options
 - In NV only 1 insurance provider: Hometown Health
 - In CA there are many providers: Provide list of insurance providers here
 
 - Updates Benefit Election Forms
- Many pages are scanned (raster) versions of digital content.
 - Often these pages could be replaced with a digital (vector) version:
 - Examples: EDD Disability Insurance Provisions, Transamerica 401K Contribution Form, Transgender Rights in the Workplace, Worker’s Comp Benefits, Sexual Harassment Hurts Everyone
- Safety Forms - Updated from Internal C/S Safety Team
 - Code of Safe Practices, Safety Warning Sign Off, Safety Policy Statement
